## ArcsineHNode class

Computes the inverse hyperbolic sine function

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class ArcsineHNode extends GenericMathNode 
```
**Extends:** [GenericMathNode](doc/markdown/./scene.genericmathnode.md)

## Remarks

Returns asinh(x) = ln(x + sqrt(x^2 + 1)) Supports scalar and vector inputs (component-wise for vectors).
